sentence.text: The transcriptional coactivator peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor-histone H3 acetylation coactivator 1-alpha (positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production-1α) has been linked to multiple neurological and psychiatric disorders including schizophrenia, but its involvement in the pathophysiology of these disorders is unclear.

entity.text: positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production

sentence.text: We measured the mRNA expression of positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production-1α and these transcripts in postmortem cortical tissue from control and schizophrenia patients and found a reduction in PGC-1α-dependent transcripts without a change in PGC-1α.

entity.text: positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production

sentence.text: While control subjects with high positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production-1α expression exhibited high PV and Nefh expression, schizophrenia subjects with high PGC-1α expression did not, suggesting dissociation between PGC-1α expression and these targets in schizophrenia.

entity.text: positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production

sentence.text: negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated-1 mRNA expression was reduced in schizophrenia, and its transcript levels predicted that of positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production-1α-dependent targets in schizophrenia.

entity.text: positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production

sentence.text: Interestingly, the positive correlation between positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production-1α and PV, Syt2, or exocytosis expression was lost in schizophrenia patients with low negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated-1 expression, suggesting that NRF-1 is a critical predictor of these genes in disease.

entity.text: positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production

sentence.text: These data suggest that schizophrenia involves a disruption in positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production-1α and/or negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated-1-associated transcriptional programs in the cortex and that approaches to enhance the activity of PGC-1α or transcriptional regulators like NRF-1 should be considered with the goal of restoring normal gene programs and improving cortical function

entity.text: positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production
